entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow mixed with rain. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Light snow at times mixed with rain ending early this evening then cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few flurries beginning overnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
